content.html: how historically accurate would you say their accents are? the fact that they're speaking English? Like I understand what you're saying but I'm wondering if you realize that the place you draw the line is very arbitrary and has little to actually do with the show.
content.value: how historically accurate would you say their accents are?  the fact that they're speaking English?  Like I understand what you're saying but I'm wondering if you realize that the place you draw the line is very arbitrary and has little to actually do with the show.
